page.title: 19GEORGINA HENDERSON 2H
page.content: My name is Georgina Henderson, my nickname is "Scrudge". I am 12 years old, my birthday is in January. I go to{Bishopston Comprehensive School,} and am in my 2nd year out of five here I live in the countryside, and I feel lucky for this, but I am worried that there will soon be no countryside left All we hear about these days is crime, murder, pollution, wars and disaster. USA's president, Mr. Reagan is talking about war in space or{Starwars all the science fiction of 10 years ago seems now to be coming true. It's time the world started thinking about the future people, not just about themselves. The governments go ahead with plans and testings, not thinking about the people of the future who could suffer for it for centuries after todays people have died. GEORGINA HENDERSON 2H
